name: Gerard Dacudao
text: 6. Criminal justice system is broken to the core.  There are 4 pillars. 1. Police work 2. Prosecuto work 3. Court system 4. Corectional facilities    These pillars under a Du30 presidency will be fixed. No doubt.  As i always say, vote for the platform not the person.  EJK is a non issue because all we have are 2nd hand info.
